question: Type checking is normally done during?
Which of the following statements is FALSE?

answers.a: In statically typed languages. each variable in a program has a fixed type
answers.b: In un-typed languages, values do not have any types
answers.c: In dynamically typed languages, variables have no types
answers.d: In all statiFcally typed languages, each variable in a program is associated woth values of only a single type during the execution of the program

question: Which of the following error is expected to recognize by semantic analyzer?
What is the full form of SDT?
What is true about Syntax Directed Definitions?

answers.a: Syntax Directed Definitions + Semantic rules = CFG
answers.b: Syntax Directed Definitions + CFG = Semantic rules
answers.c: CFG + Semantic rules = Syntax Directed Definitions
